# Presentaciones

```{r echo = F, results = 'asis'}
slides = dir('slides', full = TRUE)
links = paste0(seq_along(slides), ". ", 
  "[Slides: ", basename(slides), "]", "(", slides, "/index.html)"
)
last <- length(links)
last2 <- length(links) - 1
writeLines(links[-c(last, last2)])
```
